approval_data.project_name: V-KYC recordings to be fetched for Audit requirements
approval_data.project_summary: Develop a portal/dashboard for V-KYC team to access and download recordings for audit purposes.
project_goals: Provide V-KYC team with direct access to recordings.
Reduce dependency on IT for retrieving recordings.
approval_data.business_context: Currently, the V-KYC team requests recordings from the IT data server team. This process is manual and time-consuming. This project aims to streamline the process by providing a self-service portal.

requirements.description: A portal/dashboard should be created for accessing V-KYC recordings.
Access to the portal should be provided to Team Leads and Process Managers.
The portal should allow users to search recordings by LAN ID.
The portal should allow users to search recordings by date and month.
The recordings should be displayed in a tabular format.
The portal should provide a 'Download All' option for bulk downloads.
The system should allow users to upload a file (CSV/TXT) with a maximum of 50 LAN IDs for bulk download.
The table should display 10 records per page.
The system should download a maximum of 10 records at a time during bulk download.
The access to the screen will be available to very limited users (only Team leaders)

functional_requirements: Search functionality by LAN ID, date, and month.
Display of recording information in a tabular format.
Bulk download functionality via file upload.
Integration with the NFS server to retrieve recordings.
non_functional_requirements: The portal should be responsive and user-friendly.
The system should handle a large number of recordings efficiently.
The system should be secure and protect sensitive data.
The system should be available during business hours.
success_criteria: The portal is successfully deployed and accessible to authorized users.
Users can easily search and download recordings.
The process of retrieving recordings is significantly faster.
constraints: Recordings are stored on the LTF NFS server.
Limited access to the portal for security reasons.
File upload format is limited to CSV/TXT.
assumptions: The NFS server is accessible and functioning correctly.
The necessary network infrastructure is in place.
The V-KYC team will provide the required LAN IDs.

recommendations: Add more details on security requirements.
Specify the performance requirements (e.g., response time).
Include details on error handling and logging.

identified_gaps: Error handling and logging details are not included.
recommendations_for_completion: Define specific security measures (e.g., encryption, access controls).
Specify performance metrics (e.g., page load time, search response time).
Detail the error handling and logging mechanisms.
